CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 22, 1941, pg. 8 reads: "College Women At Mellon Hall Discuss Serious Problems...Chat...Have Tea! - Scenes as college women of both races gathered at Mellon Hall, Pennsylvania College for Women, and discussed "Student Work Experience in Service to Society to Develop a Realistic Attitude Towards Work and to Foster a Keener Sense of Responsibility."...the dining room...where tea was served to the guests. The American Association of University Women and the National Association of College Women collaborated. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Interior of dining room, with lace tablecloth on dining room table for tea, with French doors in background
